query:
SELECT 
  r.id,
  r.customerId,
  r.amount,
  r.paymentMethod,
  r.status,
  r.transactionId,
  r.createdAt,
  r.completedAt,
  c.email,
  c.name
FROM recharges r
JOIN customers c ON r.customerId = c.id
WHERE c.email = 'xkelrix@gmail.com'
ORDER BY r.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 10;
command:
